display_long_description:
Get ready to jump into CartoonGalaxy, the ultimate multiplayer VR experience designed exclusively for the Meta Quest! Created by CGDev'sProductions, this exciting game invites you to explore vibrant environments, master unique movement mechanics, and connect with friends in a universe of endless fun.

Explore the City: Wander through a bustling urban area with shops to customize your look and make your gameplay experience uniquely yours.
Roam the Forest: Climb, swing, and tag your way through a lush forest environment that’s perfect for practicing your skills and exploring with friends.
Play Your Way: Jump into popular game modes like Infection and Casual, with more exciting modes on the horizon, including the much-anticipated Sandbox Mode.

Revolutionary Movement: CartoonGalaxy introduces soft chimp locomotion, a groundbreaking movement system inspired by capuchin monkeys. Swing, climb, and run with unmatched fluidity for an immersive VR experience like no other.

Regular Updates: With monthly updates, CartoonGalaxy keeps the action fresh with new features, maps, and modes that ensure there’s always something new to discover.

If you have questions or feedback, our team would love to hear from you! Contact us anytime at theofficialcartoongalaxy45@gmail.com.

Download CartoonGalaxy today on the Meta Quest Store and become part of a growing community that’s redefining fun in VR!
